用意: 先小人後君子

2)市民有心理準備當日會有行動
3)令市民知道當天有行動係源於政府唔回應
(令佢地明白若果政府肯回應就唔會有行動阻礙到佢番工, 出街)

1) 五大訴求
一、徹底撤回修例
二、收回暴動定義
三、撤銷對今為所有反送中抗爭者控罪
四、徹底追究警隊濫權情況, 解散、追究及重組警隊
五、以行政命令解散立法會，立即實行雙真普選

咁少料

“Smart lamp posts” that has first built for trial in Kwun Tong and Kowloon Bay have raised big concerns of total Surveillance among HK citizens.

The smart lamp posts are equipped with 360° camera, Radio Frequency IDentification(RFID), 5G Wireless internet etc.
The general public is worried of face recognition and RFID function which put every citizens under surveillance. Although the government claimed that face recognition function is not yet available, TVB has once revealed this function in one of their programmes, Erasing the episode afterwards. Also citizens who have changed new HKID or used 5G network could be traced by the smart lamp posts.

The HK government has been trying to deny its surveillance function ever since which reveals the real evil goal.
Today, during Kwun Tong Anti- Surveillance March, a smart lamp post has fallen down in Kowloon Bay.
AS A FREE HONG KONG CITIZEN,
WE WOULD NEVER LET CHINAZI TO IMPOSE TOTAL SURVEILLANCE IN HONG KONG
Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times.

The parts inside are made in China:

TVB erased scene:

https://www.hgc.com.hk/corp/assets/documents/press/English/2019-05-22_Eng.pdf

Smart Recognition
Smart Recognition, powered by AI technology, is another determining factor for a Smart City. In recent years,
facial recognition has been widely adopted for commercial use. HGC provides facial recognition solutions tailored
to specific industries, fuelled by its smart customer services. Industries include security, identity verification and
behavioural analysis for customer segments.

【🧠智慧燈柱入面有啲乜？ ｜驚現天網工程部件！⚠】

觀塘遊行期間，有示威者把零碳天地對出的一支懷疑有面部辨識功能的智慧燈柱拉倒。並「解剖」燈柱內部，展露出大量零部件，其中包括：

🔵Industrial Ethernet Switch - IE 1000-8P2S-LM
制造商：Cisco（美國）
產地：中國🇨🇳
＊＊獲中華人民共和國信息產業部頒發📡『進網許可』，代表該設備可連接中國國內公用電訊網，最常出現於內地發售的「水貨」聯網產品。

🔵藍牙定位器 - SPLD01
制造商：TickTack Tech（上海）
產地：未知
＊￼母公司為上海三思路燈，即中國天網工程承辦商之一￼￼

🔵火牛 - HEP-320-24A／HEP-185-24A
制造商：Mean Well（台灣）
產地：中國🇨🇳

🔵Wi-Fi Access Point - E510
制造商：Ruckus（美國）
產地：中國🇨🇳

🔵無線路由器 單頻（2.4 GHz） 快速乙太網路 3G 4G - MAX BR1 Mini
制造商：Peplink；母公司為珩灣科技（香港）
產地：中國🇨🇳
＊配以CSL SIM card 使用

🔵1000Mbps Multi-Mode Rugged SFP - GLC-SX-MM-RGD
制造商：Cisco（美國）
產地：中國🇨🇳

https://www.facebook.com/376085539079723/posts/2568614213160167/?sfnsn=mo
